abstract: Texas Department of Criminal Justice says state prison officials have acquired small supply of pentobarbital to replenish their inventory so lethal injections set for April can be carried out.
lead_paragraph: State prison officials have acquired a small supply of pentobarbital to replenish their dwindling inventory, the Texas Department of Criminal Justice said Wednesday.

headline.main: Texas: State Obtains More Lethal Drugs
headline.print_headline: Texas: State Obtains More Lethal Drugs

snippet: State prison officials have acquired a small supply of pentobarbital to replenish their dwindling inventory, the Texas Department of Criminal Justice said Wednesday.
